name: Picture Perfect (Madison H, connorallenkilpatrick)
description:
The game is played entirely with the mouse!

Right click to scroll through the level select; left click to select a painting!

Before you get started, make sure to left click on the lid from the palette to remove it!

Left click to grab the paintbrush; right click to paint (and pick colors)!

Try and finish all 10 paintings! Can you get the blue ribbon for each?

Don't leave your brush over the palette! It can get stuck, forcing you to submit the painting early.

A game by Madison and Connor. The amazing soundtrack was made by Juan! Additional code help by Ryan.

Made in ~4 days for the 2021 Scribble Jam.
